content.rendered:
The district offered the “Parents and Guardians as Partners” webinar series with Educational Consultant and Trainer Dr. Jennifer Bashant.  Dr. Bashant is the founder of Building Better Futures LLC and provides a number of different opportunities for parents and educators to help children succeed in school.

2022-2023 Webinars

See the list of 2022-2023 webinars below.  Parents and guardians may still register and use the password provided below to watch any webinar through the end of the school year,.

September 13 | Let’s Get Organized

Click here to view the event recording 

Passcode: #BBFOrganized1

September 27 | Understanding and Addressing School Refusal

Click here to view the event recording

Passcode: KebF=&3r

October 18 | Ways to Advocate for Your Child and Partner with the School

Click here to view the event recording

Passcode: Webinar#3

November 1 | Depression and Suicide

Click here to view the event recording

Passcode: suicide1#

November 28 | Social Media Overload and the Epidemic of Loneliness

Click here to view the event recording

Passcode: socialmedia#5

December 6 | Collaborate Rather Than Dominate: A Process for Solving Difficult Problems

Click here to view the event recording

Passcode: collaborate#6

January 17 | Help Your Child Learn to Manage Strong Emotions

Click here to view the event recording

Passcode: selfreg#7

January 31 | Ways to Motivate and Engage Your Child

Click here to view the event recording

Passcode: @motivation8

February 28 | Building Executive Function Skills

Click here to view the event recording

Passcode: Execfunction#9

March 21 | Understanding the Impact of Childhood Trauma

Click here to view the event recording

Passcode: #trauma2023
